articles.title: Topley dismisses De Kock second ball
articles.description: England pick up an early wicket against South Africa as Reece Topley gets Quinton de Kock for four with just the second ball at the Cricket World Cup.
articles.content:
England pick up an early wicket against South Africa as Reece Topley gets Quinton de Kock for four with just the second ball at the Cricket World Cup.

articles.title: World Cup: England v South Africa - clips, radio & text
articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as England play South Africa in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.content:

He's gotta be strong. And he's gotta be fast. And he's gotta be fresh for Mumbai.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
